name: Hunahpu: way of the Warrior
description: A hardcore platformer with the difficulty of classic NES games. The increasing complexity and large number of strategic actions at each level. Mix and match different types of weapons, items, and build a sequence of actions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher Processor: Intel Pentium IV @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 3000 + @ 1.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
